overview: Along always go to the train station with a machete in hand. Saiful who works there, always watches Along. Faizal who had been deceived and his property was confiscated, returned to the village. Faizal continues blaming the prisoner, Along who has been the cause of him losing everything. However, since Faizal's return, Along's daily routine to the train station has not changed, especially when he found out that Taming has been released! Who is Taming? What exactly happened until Along was called a prisoner? Is Faizal's accusation against Saiful true?
title: Stesen Ke Daerah Qalbi
